This is razo 19.0.0,codenamed 'turtle_10'.

later it will be changed and extended~


[About]

Run command system by Python.

Now in alpha.

To run after install,execute:

py -m razo(for Windows)

python3 -m razo(for Unix/Linux/MacOS)
